text: PREVENT BIOMETRIC FRAUD. Introducing IDENTITY BEWARE from IsItYou. WHAT WE DO: Biometric Fraud Prevention Biometric modalities (face, eyes, voice) as identity means are rapidly emerging as the preferred choice to replace old passwords. Unlike passwords which can be changed, such identities are irreplaceable (something you are) and become high priority cyber attack targets. IsItYou uses AI-powered behavioral based technology as a security layer over such biometric modalities. It scans for potential fraud activity and keep consumers safe. IsItYou defines a new security standard to establish secure, trusted and personalized links between customers and the brands with which they carry out business. BEWARE: Safe Biometrics. Bottom Line: Is This User Human? There should be little doubt that passwords are on their way out with more advanced solutions taking over the market for authentication. Modern biometric modalities (face, eyes, voice) are rapidly emerging as preferred choices to replace old passwords. Unlike passwords that can be replaced, such identities are irreplaceable (something you are) and so become high priority cyber-attack targets. IsItYou developed deep AI-powered technology that can be layered over such authentication modalities to scan for potential fraud activity and keep consumers safe. IsItYou s Identity Biometric Early Warning Rating Engine (BEWARE) defines a new security standard to establish trusted and personalized links between customers and the brands with which they carry out business. Modern biometrics provide automated methods for individual authentication of a person by distinctive physical or behavioural characteristics, or both, that generate a unique biometric identity. The weakest aspect of any biometric modality is impersonation ‚Äìthe ability to circumvent the biometric authenticator and pretend that the subject under test is a real human being whereas in reality it is not‚Äì resulting in a fake biometric identity. The distinction whether a subject is a real human being or anything else is a multi-dimensional that cannot be addressed by simple, one-factor solutions. Based on a strong AI foundation, IsItYou has developed a technology that Fuses certain Physical body characteristics, Behavioural action patterns, Cognitive user reactions and Context-specific background geometries into a multi-class, deep self-learning engine capable of classifying biometric cyber-attacks. BEWARE s fusion process preserves the each biometric modality s markers for universality, uniqueness, and permanence while at the same time raising its resilience to impersonation attacks. Over 10 million of impersonation events across a wide range of situations were studied and classified over the course of five years. The findings from this effort were used to provide IsItYou s BEWARE with the very strong capability to differentiate between real and fake biometric identities. ONLY HUMANS ALLOWED Humans are complex creatures. They look a certain way, diffract light in a specific manner, their normal behavior includes recognizable traits. We combine user psychology, computer vision, sensor fusion, and ergonomics in a complex multi-layered analysis that provides you with a simple answer: Are they HUMAN? How to Prevent Bio-Identity Fraud? Frequently Asked Questions. I already have a face recognition solution, what can BEWARE add to it? Simply put: we can layer our impostor detector solution to whatever you ve already deployed. We can easily integrate with all major face recognition vendors to provide you and your users with an authentication solution you can truly trust. Really, it will work with other biometric engines? Yes. You can deploy IsItYou s BEWARE as an overlay to your current face recognition technology and for every recognized user it will give you an answer to the question: Are. They. Human? It sounds great, but what does the technology actually do? BEWARE integrates into your existing authentication solution and works with it to provide you with the ultimate in secure biometric authentication. BEWARE goes to work AFTER your biometric system has given the "go ahead." BEWAREgoes to work after your user has been successfully authenticated (it would be silly to scrutinize someone that was not even recognized by the system). Multiple layers and multiple factors are brought into the mix to determine whether the user that was just "recognized" is in fact the right human being. I ve heard about "liveness detection." Is this it? Yes it is, in more ways than one. In today s jargon, "liveness" detection is really motion detection. Put simply, it looks for things like blinking (movement of the eyelids), smiling, or a shake of the head. It assumes that all fraud attempts will be come in the form of a static photograph. IsItYou is different. We layer a number of methodologies that provide orthogonal responses to an authentication event. IsItYou uses an intelligent agent that adapts itself to the circumstance and helps the legitimate user reach a successful authentication. Our Technology. CONVENIENT: Convenience drives usage. To build a truly secure system it must be usable, and all things being equal, a more convenient security measure will be used more, and with higher policy-compliance than one that is cumbersome. ‚Äã BEWARE was built with this principle in mind. It examines a user s log-in attempt in the background, with none or almost no participation from the user. It requires no effort to comply, so people naturally use it more, and better. MULTI-LAYERED: BEWARE uses literally dozens of tests to determine whether a subject is truly a human or not. These tests, or "filters," each work orthogonally to render a score. These scores are then analyzed to come up with a straight-forward answer. Having dozens of tests means that there is no single point of failure. No single filter that, if fooled, would render a false-positive determination. ENGINE AGNOSTIC: You may already have an authentication engine for mobile that uses face or eye biometrics. If so, we will be happy to add BEWARE S unique capabilities to your solution and upgrade its resilience in short order. If however, you do not already have a biometric solution, we will be happy to include IsItYou s own face recognition for you to use.

Give access as many users as you like, all while avoiding network congestion. Let us worry about the details. Smart analytics: You enjoy unlimited computing power our data centers offer, running even the most complex video analysis algorithms. Public access if and when you want it: You can use Ivideon s unique technology to set up a live feed or even access to recordings for anyone and everyone visiting your site in less than a minute. Our data centers handle the added traffic. Apps built on a single platform: We develop mobile, desktop, and web applications for easy access to cameras and data on Windows, Mac OS X, Linux, iOS, and Android. Easy setup and connection: Works across most internet connection types, letting you avoid complex setup, external IP addresses, and other hoops most surveillance systems make you jump through. Above and beyond: Roll out quickly, restore easily, Integration with corporate management systems, Integration with third-party business apps, Video surveillance from moving vehicles, Server localization for corporate networks, Mapping surveillance locations. Data savings: Ivideon lets you avoid constantly recording to the cloud and the data usage that entails, instead only saving events that trigger the motion detector, the sound detector, or external sensors. Your choice of data transfer networks: You enjoy high-quality video and all the powerful features Ivideon offers even over satellite or 3G Internet. Reliable security for your personal information: All traffic is fully encrypted in keeping with the same TLS standard applied to banking operations. Multilevel system redundancy: Ivideon developed and implemented a system guaranteeing data security and uninterrupted service for video surveillance cameras. The company has more than 15 data centers around the world ready to pick up the slack whenever a hub fails. 8 reasons why Ivideon is right for you: It is the top platform for video surveillance, Our system automatically monitors cameras, You can evaluate our service at minimal expense, We offer excellent quality at prices you can handle, Rollout and support is cheaper with us, We are a team of professionals, Setup and connection don t get any easier, Our tech support is always there for you. text: YOUR ENVIRONMENT City Airport Rail Subway Trams & buses Retail Private property YOUR OBJECTIVES Providing services Enhancing attractiveness Monetising audiences Improving connectivity Supplying self-service bikes Achieving great projects OUR EXPERTISE Design Innovation Cleaning & maintenance Digital Sustainability. OUR MEDIA Connecting brands with urban audiences Worldwide presence Trends in Out-of-Home OUR AUDIENCES The urban population Shoppers Commuters Airport passengers YOUR OBJECTIVES Building brand fame Engaging consumers Driving to store, mobile & online Targeting messaging to time & location OUR SOLUTIONS International campaign management Creative Solutions Research & audience insights Dynamic content. For You: Cities are changing, usages are MORE ATTRACTIVEMORE USEFULMORE RESPONSIBLEMORE CONNECTEDMORE ENGAGING. We design street furniture that will develop or reinforce the identity of the site where it is located. From streetlights to mobile charging stations, we design street furniture and services that provide practical everyday benefits. From design to installation and upkeep, our street furniture and services are financed by advertising. From electric bikes to Wi-Fi hotspots, we continue to develop new services to meet your evolving needs. Our goal is to surprise and entertain you around the city with more interactive and creative advertising. OUT-OF-HOME ADVERTISING Activities In 1964, Jean-Claude Decaux invented advertising street furniture. Ever since, JCDecaux‚Äînow the global industry leader‚Äîhas been the only international player focused exclusively on outdoor advertising, developing 3 areas of business: street furniture, transport advertising and billboard advertising. OUR MISSION. Always keep innovating, for everyone s benefit. JCDecaux designs, installs and maintains a range of free or low-cost services for the benefit of cities, residents and travellers, including bus shelters, self-service bicycle schemes, passenger information panels and mobile charging terminals. These services are financed by advertisements that are located in busy thoroughfares, offering brands maximum visibility. Because it benefits all stakeholders‚Äîlocal governments, advertisers and users‚Äîthis business model is unique and sustainable, and has been a constant source of innovation for the past 50 years. It is adaptable to society s changing needs, as can be seen today in the integration of connectivity solutions. STREET FURNITURE. Inventor and global leader. Street furniture combines advertising with public services for city residents and travellers. Since the invention of advertising bus shelters in 1964, we have continuously improved and diversified our products. Our innovations are helping realise the vision of smart cities while providing the latest solutions to advertisers. Today, 3,890 cities with more than 10,000 inhabitants place their trust in JCDecaux. FOCUS. Cyclocity, leader in self-service bike rental scheme. Cyclocity¬Æ is a self-service bicycle scheme for cities. Its design is the outcome of years of work by our multi-disciplinary teams from the Industrial Division, the Graphic Arts Department, the IT Systems Division and the Innovation and Interactive Products Division. The Group continues to innovate to meet the needs of cities and their inhabitants, as can be seen in its 2015 launch of self-service hybrid bicycles with personal, portable battery. TRANSPORT ADVERTISING. Number 1 worldwide. JCDecaux manages advertising concessions in airports, metro systems, bus systems, trains and light rail. In line with our business model, we also take care of the design, installation, maintenance and financing of services like Wi-Fi connections and mobile charging terminals. We are constantly innovating to meet passengers  evolving needs. BILLBOARD ADVERTISING. Number one in Europe. Billboards are the oldest form of outdoor advertising. JCDecaux has revolutionised this medium by focusing on qualitative solutions. With innovations like scrolling panels, iconic giant displays and wall-wraps for fa√ßades, advertisers achieve maximum impact. These spaces are strategically located and fit harmoniously into their surroundings. FOR PARTNERS True to its sustainable business model, JCDecaux offers a vast array of services for inhabitants and passengers in urban environments. OUR DRIVE Innovation JCDecaux was created thanks to an innovation: the advertising bus shelter. And with it arrived a new business model: street furniture financed by advertising. We haven t stopped innovating ever since, continuously offering more services while enhancing the surrounding environment. CREATION. An ongoing approach. JCDecaux s success has always been grounded in a unique spirit of innovation and an ambitious Research & Development policy. The effectiveness of this strategy can be seen in all of our products and services. Cyclocity self-service bikes are now a must-have all around the world, and interactive screens and Wi-Fi terminals are appearing everywhere in cities and on transport systems.  Innovation enables us to anticipate constantly changing needs, to contribute to the design of the city of tomorrow and to help make transportation systems more enjoyable for passengers. IN-HOUSE EXPERTISE. Four pillars of innovation. JCDecaux s innovations meet four criteria: quality, style, functionality and environmental performance, which means adhering to eco-friendly design (strength, durability, low energy consumption and the use of recyclable materials). Only the longstanding multidisciplinary expertise offered by JCDecaux can meet such exacting requirements. Our 120 engineers and technicians working in R&D handle 400 projects a year. At any given time, our teams are working on 50 ongoing projects. ADAPTABILITY. Anticipating new forms of usage. JCDecaux is a company with a local presence, whose solutions interact daily with users in over 80 countries. This proximity inspires us and drives us to continuously adapt to changes in technology, user behaviour and client needs. Accordingly, JCDecaux s R&D efforts have evolved to incorporate new partners like start-ups and research centres directly into the innovation process. This new structure has also facilitated collaborative efforts to upgrade existing street furniture, which are essential to keeping up with the growing complexity of digital platforms. AWARDS. Recognition of our creative solutions. Our ongoing pursuit of excellence in design and sustainable development has been recognised on numerous occasions. Over the years, JCDecaux has won Good Design Awards (the world s oldest and most prestigious award of its type) and Green Good Design Awards for the quality, style and sustainability of its product designs. WHERE STYLE MEETS SERVICE Design JCDecaux offers accessible services to meet the daily needs of all. Quality and style are essential components of these services, resulting in street furniture that is as attractive as it is practical. HIGH STANDARDS, EVERY DAY Cleaning & Maintenance JCDecaux is recognised by cities, transport authorities and advertisers for the quality of its maintenance and upkeep services, which contribute to each location s appeal every day. CLOSER, MORE RESPONSIVE AND MORE FLEXIBLE Digital JCDecaux s attractive digital screens offer a new way to inform and advertise that is effective, customised and responsive. IN REAL TIME. The right message, at the right place, at the right time. Digital screens by JCDecaux are placed in busy thoroughfares, where they are visible daily to residents and travellers. For cities and transport authorities, they offer a responsive solution that can deliver a wide range of messages in real time, like weather, traffic, event announcements and alerts. Their flexibility also makes it possible to broadcast a customised message at a specific place and time. For example, an airport can greet travellers exiting a plane in the language of their country of origin. Digital screens offer adaptability and targeted information, whatever the need. DIGITAL COMMUNICATION. Impact and engagement. Thanks to their visibility and stylish design, JCDecaux s digital platforms can enhance the impact of communication campaigns by cities and transport authorities. A truly complementary solution, they can also be combined with other forms of media, with the option of using the same editorial line and graphic elements. Connected and context-responsive, they can even be linked in real time to social networks like Twitter and Facebook. They provide a flexible and effective addition to a comprehensive, multi-channel strategy. Distributing content on entertainment, culture, news and more, the digital platforms provide an enhanced experience for residents and travellers. INTERACTIVE DIGITAL PLATFORMS. Smart service. Interactive digital platforms are equipped with screens that inform residents and travellers about their city. The open platform, which runs on an Android operating system, can support applications, mobile websites and RSS feeds. The possibilities are endless. The system has a customisable design, is simple to administer and is scalable and adjustable to different kinds of street furniture, ensuring the right message gets delivered in the right place. Users get access at their fingertips to a wide range of local information related to public transit, cultural and sport venues, shopping and more. A UNIQUE NETWORK Key figures & worldwide presence Our network of outdoor advertising displays is one of the largest in the global media industry. Every day, JCDecaux reaches an audience of 890 million people on the planet. MASS MEDIA. Powerful and flexible. As audiences and communication channels become more fragmented, JCDecaux stands out for its ability to combine mass media and targeted solutions. JCDecaux owes its distinctiveness to its presence in cities, transport systems and major thoroughfares. With the global population becoming increasingly urban and mobile, our solutions become more effective with each passing year. We are now one of the most influential media networks on the global level, and one of the most flexible on the local level. More than 80 countries 3,890 cities 1,061,630 advertising panels ‚Ç¨3,890m 2019 revenue 13,210 employees. IN SUPPORT OF RESPONSIBLE GROWTH Our strategy A core element of the company s strategy, sustainable development enables us to anticipate future changes and represents a significant driver of growth and innovation. COMMITMENT. Going back decades. BUSINESS MODEL. Responsible and sustainable. SUSTAINABLE DEVELOPMENT STRATEGY. Our six priorities. Environment Reduce our energy consumption Environment Reduce our other environmental impacts Social Deploy a Group-wide Health & Safety Policy Social Implement an ambitious Group-wide Social Policy Stakeholder Reinforce sustainable development in the Purchasing Policy Stakeholder Strengthen employees  commitment towards sustainable development. MEETING THE GREAT CHALLENGES FACING THE PLANET Environmental priorities JCDecaux s activities are implemented at the heart of cities and transport systems, closest to users and economic activity. This presence means we have a key responsibility: limiting our environmental footprint. COMMITTED TO OUR EMPLOYEES Social priorities Each one of our 13,040 employees is essential to our Group. Respect for people, safety, and health constitute the core of our company values. MEETING THE NEEDS OF ALL STAKEHOLDERS Stakeholder priorities When it comes to serving the public, contributing to the attractiveness of cities and improving the quality of life in cities and transport systems, we innovate daily to meet the needs of our stakeholders and offer products and services with high environmental and functional performance. PASSIONATE AND INNOVATIVE Who we are A family-owned company, JCDecaux has been innovating since 1964, to become the number one outdoor advertising company worldwide. Happy or Hangry? JCDecaux uses unique Out-of-Home first facial recognition to launch Yoplait Yoghurt Smoothies. Outdoor Advertising Facial & Gesture Recognition Technology. MOVEMBER | FACIAL RECOGNITION DISPENSER PANEL | NOVEMBER 2019 The panel scanned a man s face, detected a mo and then cleverly analysed the potential for "pash rash". If the scanner detected a rash, the gent was rewarded with a cream from the Movember Rain range.

Our technology: Data technology, artificial intelligence, internet of things, blockchain. Digital finance: By using network, knowledge graph, neural network, behaviour sequence and biometrics technologies, JD Finance has built leading smart risk control, wealth management, insurance technology, payment and other smart services.  As an example, JD Digits has created the industry s top smart risk control system which includes the "Risk Control Super Brain." Through this solution, the brand has already assessed the credit risk of more than 500 million users, helping to keep the bad asset rates for consumer finance business at the lowest levels of the industry.  In last four years, JD Finance has cooperated with 15 banks to issue "Xiaobai Card", including ICBC, China CITIC Bank and many other large banks. Now, accumulative total applications for "Xiaobai Card" has reached more than 20 million. Through opening technology, risk control, scenario and marketing advantages to financial institutions, JD Finance can help them lower the costs to find target customers and bring better services to their customers. Intelligent cities: Marking a fresh start for the company s urban computing business, JD iCity is the company s intelligent city brand which provides total intelligent solutions for China s urban development. These solutions cover seven major areas, including planning, transportation, energy, environmental protection, urban credit, public safety, and e-government services.  Lying at the heart of JD Digits  pioneering operating system for cities, the city operating system helps solve the key challenges faced in intelligent urban development. This operating system aims to empower cities and their public services to go online and become both intelligent and highly digitized. At present, JD iCity has deployed its system in Beijing, Shanghai, Guangzhou, Nanjing, Chengdu, and Suqian as well as other cities.  JD Digits is working closely with its business partners to promote intelligent city development across China. For example, the company has collaborated with National Electric Nanning Power Generation Co. Ltd. to help establish a thermal combustion simulator that integrates AI technologies with traditional operating mechanisms. If AI-optimized thermal power generation technologies are applied across more than 2,000 generator sets nationwide, the industry could save an estimated 10 billion RMB every year on the costs of coal combustion and pollution control alone. Digital Agri-Husbandry: JD Agri-husbandry provides smart solutions for various segments of China s agricultural and husbandry industry, helping to take them online and adopt cutting-edge digital technologies, such as AI and the IoT. For example, the JD Digits brand s smart breeding system has brought the latest AI technologies to animal breeding in China. By leveraging JD Agri-husbandry s solution, large and medium-sized companies in the pig-breeding industry can reduce their labor costs by over 30%, as well as their feed costs by 8-10%, and ultimately cut the total cost of breeding each individual pig by up to 80 RMB. The helps ensure that pig-breeding companies are able to maximize their profits. Digital Marketing: Based on the IoT, JD MO Media is a new digital marketing service system and China s leading offline advertising trading platform. At present, it covers three million offline screens directed at five major areas, including the community, travel, consumption, work, and the public. The advanced digital marketing solution enables advertisers to accurately match users, guide data delivery, optimize on-site resources, develop the best pricing strategy, and evaluate impact. This empowers them to easily connect with their target audiences and achieve the maximum results from their marketing efforts. For the media, the solution ultimately helps them to achieve lower costs, higher revenue, and strengthened market competitiveness. Digital Asset Management: JD Finance has also harnessed big data, blockchain, AI, natural language processing (NLP), and other cutting-edge technologies to launch the financial service industry s first one-stop smart management technology system, JT¬≤. This provides institutional investors with capabilities covering product design, sales trading, asset management, and risk assessment. AI for Blue Sky By applying AI-powered technologies to thermal power generation, we can save an estimated USD 1.45 billion a year on the costs of coal combustion and pollution control. JD Digits has partnered with China National Electric Nanning Power Generation Co. Ltd. to establish a thermal combustion simulator that integrates AI technologies with traditional operating mechanisms. Our technologies can help increase the boiler efficiency by 0.5%. If the AI-optimized technologies are applied across more than 2,000 generator sets nationwide, the industry can save an estimated USD 1.45 billion a year on the costs of coal combustion and pollution control. Technologies for Agriculture As part of JD Digits  intelligent breeding system, AI and IoT technologies are widely applied to feed pigs. JD Digits  agri-husbandry solution helps large and medium-sized companies in the pig-breeding industry reduce labor costs by over 30% and feed costs by 8-10%, increasing productivity and profitability for pig farmers. JD Digits uses data technology and the Internet to help traditional industries operate with higher efficiency and lower cost. First established as part of JD.com, it became an independent business in October 2013, with the mission of creating a better future with technology. Formerly known as JD Finance, the company was rebranded as JD Digits in November 2018 to encompass finance, urban computing, agriculture, campus services and digital marketing. JD Digits leverages the latest and most cutting-edge technologies, including big data, artificial intelligence (AI), the Internet of Things (IoT), and blockchain, to help financial and real economy sectors reduce costs, improve efficiencies, optimize the user experience and advance business models, while fostering equitable and inclusive social values. Our Values  CUSTOMER FIRST INTEGRITY COLLABORATION GRATITUDE ALL IN OWNERSHIP. Sustainability: Digitalization, inclusiveness, innovation, and connection are the core values at the heart of JD Digits  to fulfill its social responsibilities, create long-term social value, and promote sustainable development. The company is committed to applying digital technology to the areas with the greatest potential, including inclusive digital finance, targeted poverty relief, financial risk management, innovation-driven development, and smart city development, with the aim of increasing productivity, reducing costs, and achieving its mission of "creating a better future with technology." Digital Finance: TOTAL LOANS TO SMALL-MICRO BUSINESSES OF OVER 500 BILLION RMB, DIGITAL TECHNOLOGIES REDUCED LOAN COSTS FOR FARMERS BY 60%, RURAL FINANCE BUSINESS COVERS 1,700 COUNTRIES AND 300,000 VILLAGES. Targeted Poverty Alleviation: 300+ CROWDFUNDING PROJECTS FOR POVERTY ALLEVIATION in 100 IMPOVERISHED RURAL COUNTIES. Combating Financial Fraud: ASSISTED POLICE IN SOLVING OVER 80 FINANCIAL FRAUD CASSES, OVER 500 CRIMINAL SUSPECTS ARRESTED, SAVED BILLIONS IN POTENTIAL LOSSES FOR CONSUMERS. Helping the real economy serve micro, small and medium-sized enterprises. Serving agriculture, rural areas and farmers through targeted poverty alleviation. JD Digits  advanced risk management.

WE BELIEVE EVERYTHING IS POSSIBLE. Kauel s culture: Our team s positive attitude allows us to deliver extraordinary results and unique solutions for our clients in the best time lapse possible. AVANT-GARDE IS WHERE WE ARE AT. ONLY THE BEST ARE PART OF OUR TEAM. WE TRULY LISTEN THE NEEDS. POSITIVES WHEN FACING CHALLENGES. EVERY PROBLEM HAS A SOLUTION. WE BREAK PARADIGMS AND CHALLENGE THE STATUS QUO. This technology and innovation company began in 2004, when our founder Edmundo Casas, a recent graduate in Electronic Engineering from the "Universidad T√©cnica Federico Santa Mar√≠a" in Chile, started selling equipment to set up school s physics laboratories and because he prepared boxes of 10 watts of power that equaled one-hundredth of the 745.5 watts of a Horse Power, he decides to call his, at that time Start-up, Colt Power Ideas , being "Potrillo" the Spanish word for Colt. The company quickly begins to grow and Edmundo invites his friend Cristian Romero, also an Electronic Engineer from the same university, to join as co-founder and during the company s first 4 years they focused on the development of innovative technology products for entertainment, culture, and education purposes. The year of Chile s Bicentennial celebration (2010), brought the first investors interested in making the Colt grow, which resulted in Alejandra Mustakis betting on us and joining the team as a key player for the growth of the company as we know it. It was her father, Mr. Constantino Mustakis, who suggested that it was time to grow and from that day we stopped being a "Colt". This is how in 2010, we released a new name, and became Kauel , which means "Faul" in Mapudungun (Chileans second native language), while creating the hologram pyramid, an invention made with one of our own patents, which burst into the marketing industry and also received the Best Invention Award of the year , awarded by Chilean Ministry of Economy. In 2012, our invention our Kinect technology is awarded the President of the Republic Award as the most Innovative Development and this in conjunction with our developments placed us at the center of innovation, technology, and entrepreneurship of the country. The following year, we are once again recognized, this time by the Chamber of Commerce and ProChile, for exporting technology and having the Papalote and the Culiacan Museum in Mexico as our clients, exhibiting our technology. By 2015 we decided on a new strategic path towards other industries and found new opportunities in the service, power supply, oil, mining, retail, and health sectors to deliver high-value solutions. This aroused interest in the company once again, and that is how in 2018 we added new investment partners to our board of directors. This time is INVEXOR Capital , who sees in us a strong company with the possibility of placing Chile on the map of the technological vanguard, with Kauel being the epicenter of the Industry 4.0 in Chile and Latin America. Technologies We use to change the world... WE SPECIALIZE IN: Artificial Intelligence (AI) It is the artificial imitation of human intelligence processes done by machines. These processes include learning (the acquisition of data and rules for the use of information), reasoning (using the rules to reach approximate or final conclusions) and self-correction. Virtual Reality (VR) It is an environment composed by different scenes and virtual objects of real appearance generated by computer technology, which gives the user the feeling of being immersed in it. Augmented Reality (AR) It refers to the real-time insertion, of virtual elements within the physical universe. A person can observe the real world with certain elements added, which appear in their lenses or screen as digital information, through the use of lenses or other special devices. Internet of Things (I.o.T) The Internet of Things (IoT) is a system of connected computing devices. These are mechanical and digital machines, objects, animals or people that have unique identifiers and the ability to transfer data through a network, without requiring human-to-human or human-to-computer interactions. Big Data (BD) Big Data is a term that describes the large volume of data, both structured and unstructured, which are generated from processes. But it is not the amount of data that is important, what matters with Big Data is what companies and organizations can do with it. & Nbsp; Big Data can be analyzed to get ideas and trends & nbsp; that lead to better decisions and strategic business movements. Analytics It is responsible for analyzing and shaping the information, in a friendly way, used for decisions decision making on different aspects such as processes, Web, e-Commerce, companies or brand in general. "All our knowledge has its origin in our perceptions." Leonaro Da Vinci.

From authentication to the future of identity. Keyless changes the way we interact with the digital world by giving users peace of mind and control over their identity, while enabling the enterprise to make data privacy and security the rule rather than the exception. Nothing to remember, nothing to steal. You are the key By combining privacy-preserving distributed computation and zero-knowledge cryptography with the convenience of modern biometric authentication methods, Keyless provides seamless zero-trust authentication capabilities accessible from any device. Military-grade security and state-of-the-art biometrics. Keyless is a secure and easy-to-use authentication and identity management system that respects your privacy. Built using military-grade security and state-of-the-art biometrics, Keyless replaces something you need to remember (e.g. your PIN or password) with something unique about you (e.g. your face). Secure multi-party computation Keyless authenticates users without revealing their biometrics or their cryptographic keys using advanced secure multi-party computation protocols. Advanced biometric authentication Keyless uses advanced biometric authentication with liveness detection, which cannot be fooled using photo, a video, or a Hollywood-style mannequin. Two distinct authentication factors Keyless seamlessly integrates two distinct authenticator factors: your biometrics, and your trusted device using cryptographic zero-knowledge proofs. Zero-knowledge biometric authentication The Keyless protocol implements zero-knowledge biometric authentication and key management using secure multi-party computation. It supports several biometric modalities, including face recognition, fingerprints, and iris. The users interact with a set of nodes in the Keyless network. Each node stores cryptographically-protected shares of the users biometric data and keys. Using these shares, users can perform authentication without storing any biometric template on their device. Seamless UX Easy to use, accessible anywhere, anytime By combining cloud computing and biometrics, Keyless reduces authentication friction, and lowers operational costs of account lockouts. Zero-trust security Nothing to steal, no central honeypot, no keys on the user devices With its zero-knowledge decentralized architecture, data can never be stolen or lost because no private information is accessible to the network. Private by design Built for compliance. GDPR-proof Keyless is helping businesses to reduce the burden of compliance with security and privacy regulations by giving users control over their data. Built-in anti-fraud No more phishing and credential stuffing Nothing to remember, means nothing to phish - Keyless embeds strong anti-phishing technology and behavioral authentication to minimize the risk of fraud and user deception. Simple, secure, and interoperable authentication Keyless offers unmatched security, privacy and usability, while reducing risk and infrastructure costs. Our authentication system enables effortless biometric authentication for business customers, users, and employees. Our modality-agnostic design helps businesses provide tailored authentication workflows and flexible multi-factor authentication (MFA), ensuring a high level of protection and positive user experience. Authentication made secure, usable and above all private. Adopt Keyless  zero-knowledge biometric authentication as part of your multi-factor authentication journeys to enable military grade security and ensure end-to-end privacy of biometric data, an issue increasingly growing in importance and relevance in both workforce and consumer scenarios. Keyless Authenticator Workforce authentication Enhance your existing IAM solution with zero-knowledge multi-factor biometric authentication. Bring the convenience of facial recognition to your workforce authentication journeys while leaving behind any related GDPR concerns. Keyless mobile SDK Consumer authentication Instill trust in your customers by safeguarding their biometric data using our end-to-end privacy platform. With the help of directives such as open banking and PSD2, there is a long overdue drive towards strong customer authentication. This can have a negative impact on user experience, creating friction and frustration for your customers. Streamline Streamline UX and access everywhere Security Improve security and reduce cost Compliance Build trust and ensure compliance Authenticate Prevent fraud and authenticate continuously. The competitive advantage in your industry. Keyless can transform authentication and identity for your organization to give you a competitive advantage in your industry. Keyless provides brokers, payment processors, and banks with frictionless and secure multi-factor authentication, while greatly reducing risks associated with fraud and phishing. Finance & Banking Our behavioral biometric technology enables seamless transaction verification. All sensitive data stored and processed by Keyless is always encrypted, and Keyless does not have the ability to decrypt it. As a result, Keyless is compliant with strict privacy regulations, including PSD2/SCA. Keyless offers unmatched user experience and security to cryptocurrency wallets and exchanges. With Keyless, onboarding becomes as simple as glancing at a device. No more seed phrases to write down, no more passwords to forget. With its advanced biometric technology, paired with secure multi-party computation protocols executed over a decentralized network, Keyless safely stores and processes cryptographic keys and tokens on behalf of the user. Fintech & Blockchain Keyless is not tied to a single platform or device, and can be used with all the popular mobile and desktop operating systems. Built-in social recovery allows user to recover their keys if they lose access to all their devices, thus eliminating the risk of loss of cryptocurrencies, and reducing account recovery costs. Because all personal user information is stored and processed in encrypted form, Keyless is GDPR- and PSD2-compliant. With keyless, airports can increase passenger throughput, reduce plane boarding time, and minimize airport security and border control lines. Travel Keyless improves user experience by allowing seamless transitions between a variety of services across airports, including baggage pick up, shopping at duty-free shops, and access to airline lounges. Keyless is the ideal solution for secure biometric access to hotel rooms, office buildings, apartment complexes, and rental vehicles. Hospitality & Automotive With Keyless, users can register once, and gain the ability to access any building they are authorized to. Keyless simplifies interactions between users and governments by providing a secure, unified, and frictionless system for managing authentication, identity, and e-signatures. Government & Public Administration Users do not need to remember passwords or PINs, or carefully safeguard keys or tokens. They can perform common government tasks after simply authenticating using their face and behavioral signals. Thanks to the advanced multi-party cryptographic protocols used in Keyless, no sensitive data is ever stored on the user s devices.Keyless provides the highest level of authentication security and secure template storage using state-of-the-art face recognition and iris scan technologies, combined with secure multi-party computation protocols. Aerospace & Defense. Over 10 years of deep-tech research brought to life. At Keyless we are driven by one vision: to create a world where anyone can seamlessly access any digital service from any device, at any time, while keeping personal credentials safe, private and under control. Where the only key is you. A world that is Keyless. Keyless: a snapshot Pioneering the world s first privacy-preserving biometric authentication and personal identity management platform that eliminates the need for businesses to centrally store and manage biometric data, passwords, personal cryptographic keys and any other sensitive information without compromising on convenience and privacy. EXPERIENCED TEAM   20 team members   6 PHDs & 2 MBAs   World s top 10 privacy and security scholar   10+ years of research in biometrics & cryptography STRONG PARTNERS   Backed by top tier VCs from Silicon Valley, Asia, Europe (US$3.0M raised to date)   Graduated from 3 leading acceleration programs in UK, USA, and Asia   Supported by renowned academic institutions and industry alliances GLOBAL FOOTPRINT   HQ - London, UK   R&D - Rome, IT   BD - Singapore, SG. The Keyless team We are a diverse, international team of experienced entrepreneurs, established scientists and motivated professionals. However different, we are all passionate about pioneering world-class products that help our customers solve usability, privacy and security challenges in authentication of tomorrow, today. We made several breakthroughs in the area of secure, private, and distributed biometric authentication. Our unique technology is based on more than 10 years of research at the intersection of cryptography and biometrics. Our Culture We believe we will be successful if our clients are successful. We value humility, collaboration, respect, inclusion, and integrity. We have great people working together as a dream team, upholding these five fundamental principles by which we live, work, and grow as a team. Our mission is to help businesses make data privacy and security the rule not the exception, while giving users the peace of mind and control of their personal data.

Video Analysis, Search CCTV and Covert Surveillance for forensic video Investigations. Professional video reports from Capture to Court. We have built the most comprehensive solution for video investigations. We provide you with one platform to manage all your video Investigations. Choose the profile that matches you best. POLICE: Detectives are presented with video data on a daily basis. CCTV is used to verify victim, suspect and witness statements. An image or video can provide key evidence and facilitate prosecutions. However, the issue for law enforcement agencies is the time and effort required to retrieve, view, analyse and report on video footage as evidence. Kinesense s solutions have been designed with police to help them deal with video evidence from capture to court. ACT ON EVIDENCE QUICKLY. Security Agency: Covert policing operations can be complex and high risk. Agencies need to get actionable intelligence from their video resources quickly and easily. Kinesense s solution can be used to scan vast amount of video data either remotely or post event. Suspect tagging enables you to keep track of key events and suspects movements. Intelligence data can be exploited in a case by merging video data with other sources such a phone and internet data. Connections between cases can be made by centrally storing key data. SCAN LARGE VOLUMES OF SURVEILLANCE FOOTAGE. CCTV Specialist: CCTV is recorded in thousands of different formats around the world. Security Manager: If you are operating a control room, you will have to review video on a daily basis. When an incident occurs you can rapidly analyse footage to find key events. To learn how to get more from CCTV, contact us today. Retail: As per GDPR rules, if you have a data access request for CCTV, it is mandatory for you to redact, blur, darken or pixilate other parties who appear in the video. Kinesense Redact enables you to import any video format and redact faces, licence plates, or other sensitive information. Shops and retail outlets can make better use of CCTV for security and operational purposes. Shoplifting, slip and fall claims, criminal damage and theft are all issues for retail. Using our Kinesense Redact solution the right image can be quickly found to provide key evidence and facilitate prosecutions. ANALYZE FOOTAGE. Traffic Analyst: Kinesense Collision Investigation Toolkit enables investigators to quickly retrieve CCTV and automatically calculate vehicle speed when investigating road accidents. It makes it easy to utilise video in traffic incidents. We have worked on a number of traffic investigation projects including red light infringement analysis. Contact us to discuss your specific requirements. EASY REVIEW. Why Kinesense? We provide you with one platform to manage all your video Investigations tasks. By combining our smart video search technology with easy to use reporting functionality, investigators can generate leads faster.   Everything we do is driven by the real-world needs of the investigators we support.   - Sarah Doyle, CEO. About Us In 2009, Mark and Sarah set out to solve a needle in a haystack problem: how to find critical evidence hidden in thousands of hours of video. The time and effort required to retrieve, view, analyse and report on video footage as evidence is a huge drain on resources. CCTV needed a new strategy, a new model and new tools. Kinesense was born to help get actionable intelligence from video faster. Kinesense addresses the need of our customers on a global basis. Kinesense provides software solutions for video investigations. Capture to court. Face Detection & Face Recognition. Digital Evidence Management. Video Report & Clarification. CCTV Player Management. Video Redaction. text: ADVANCING ON-DEVICE EDGE AI INFERENCING Kneron s solutions are engineered to enable on-device AI inferencing  and solve real market needs accurately and securely while lowering time to market for our partners. FAST: Low latency, instant inferencing. LOW COST: Cost-effective customized solutions. PRIVATE: Private data isn t stored on public cloud servers.  LIGHTWEIGHT: On-device AI models under 64MB for embedded applications. Kneron s market-ready solutions enable on-device AI inferencing and are cost-effective for device makers. Our patented reconfigurable technology allows our solutions to adapt in real-time to audio, 2D, and 3D image recognition application needs, and support mainstream AI frameworks and CNN models. AI SYSTEM ON CHIP (SoC): Best in class balance of performance and power efficiency. NEURAL PROCESSING UNIT (NPU): AI algorithm models that enable and accelerate AI inferencing on-device. VISUAL RECOGNITION SOLUTIONS: Lightweight visual recognition algorithms that outperform models double in size. Kneron s solutions are designed to accelerate AI computing in the smart home, smartphones, smart surveillance, and security devices. Kneron s solutions enable smart home products to be truly intelligent. Through visual and audio commands, users will be able to control various smart home products without worrying about personal data sent to the cloud. By using Kneron s solutions, a mid to low-end smartphone equipped with a low-cost camera can perform precise facial recognition that would normally only work on high-end smartphones with complex sensor modules. Kneron s on-device computation enables cameras to instantly detect multiple faces, verify identities, and recognize dangerous objects. This can also be applied to traffic controls such as license plate detection and lane control. Kneron is ahead of the field when it comes to facial recognition based security applications like payments, door security, and attendance management. Our solutions will help you meet your security needs. On-device edge AI is when AI computing and inferencing happens on-device rather than in cloud servers. Since edge devices have power and storage limitations, on-device AI inferencing requires striking a difficult, but vital balance of performance, power, and size. We are obsessed with innovating on-device edge AI solutions that work seamlessly with cloud-based AI. Kneron can customize integrated total system hardware + software solutions that are ideal for hardware makers and industry partners looking to instantly accelerate on-device edge AI computing affordably. Established in San Diego in 2015, Kneron is a leading provider of edge AI solutions. It is dedicated to the design and development of integrated software and hardware edge AI solutions for AIoT, smart home, smart surveillance, security, mobile devices, robotics, and industrial control. Kneron s mission is to enable and empower edge AI to be everywhere. Kneron s investors from the series A round of investments in November 2017 include Alibaba Entrepreneurs Fund, CDIB, Himax Technologies, Inc, Qualcomm, Thundersoft, Sequoia Capital (and sub fund: CloudAtlas), and CYZONE. In May, 2018, Kneron announced the completion of their series A1 financing led by Horizons Ventures, a venture capital firm founded by Ka-shing Li.

text: Autonomous Security Robots: ASRs are Running Fully Autonomously 24/7/365 Across the Country Today. The Future is Now. OUR STORY. Knightscope s long-term mission is to make the United States of America the safest country in the world, changing everything for everyone.  Imagine if that lofty goal could be met - the impact on housing prices, volatility of financial markets, insurance rates, property values, municipal budgets, viability of a local business and the safety of your family, friends and loved ones would be profound. Crime has a $1+ trillion negative economic impact on the U.S. economy every year.  There are 2+ million law enforcement and security professionals across the country that get up every morning willing take a bullet for each of us, yet the tools we have provided them to do their jobs effectively is beneath the dignity of our nation. Founded in Silicon Valley on April 4, 2013, Knightscope is a leader in developing autonomous security capabilities with a vision to one day be able to predict and prevent crime disrupting the $500 billion security industry. The technology is a profound combination of self-driving technology, robotics and artificial intelligence. We presently market a K1 stationary machine, K3 indoor machine and K5 outdoor machine.  The K7 multi-terrain four-wheel version is under development. The Knightscope solution to reduce crime combines the physical presence of our proprietary Autonomous Data Machines ("ADMs"), also known as Autonomous Security Robots (ASRs), with real-time onsite data collection and analysis. Our machines autonomously patrol client sites without the need for remote control to provide a visible, force multiplying, physical security presence to help protect assets, monitor changes in the area and deter crime. The data is accessible through our Knightscope Security Operations Center ("KSOC"), an intuitive, browser-based interface that enables security professionals to review events generated from "really smart mobile eyes and ears" to do their jobs more effectively.  Knightscope has raised in excess of $40 million from four major corporations and over 6,000 family offices and retail investors since inception. The Company is in the process of raising $50M in growth capital as it considers a potential public listing.  Knightscope has reserved its ticker symbol "KSCP" on NASDAQ.

Collaborate: Partner with other groups that seek to prevent the abuse of facial recognition technology. Kogniz is committed to being transparent and accountable to all stakeholders.

text: We re proud to be part of india s digital transformation. Data security at the highest level. >COMBINING CUSTOMER ENGAGEMENT WITH REVOLUTIONARY NEW WAYS TO PREDICT LIFE EVENTS IN REAL TIME. As finalists in the Vizag Fintech Festival, we have just been awarded $110,000 to open an office there. We look forward to the incredible new opportunities that await us. WE HAVE BEEN CERTIFIED AS A LIFE EXPECTANCY PROVIDER BY THE STATE OF FLORIDA. DR. JAY OLSHANSKY, OUR CO-FOUNDER AND CHIEF SCIENCE OFFICER, HAS PUBLISHED A NEW WHITE PAPER ON: Longevity and Health of U.S. Presidential Candidates for the 2020 Election. AI-POWERED LIFE EVENT PREDICTION IS HERE. At Lapetus Solutions, world-renowned scientists leverage the power of Artificial Intelligence (AI) to develop revolutionary new ways to predict life events in real time, combining: Sensory Analytics An emerging science-based technology that uses digital images to examine an individual s physical features to determine longevity, health status and disease susceptibility. Life Sciences Combining decades of longevity research with biodemography at the core, specific covariates linked to longevity are identified and predictive algorithms are generated. Dynamic Questioning Scientifically formulated questions that change according to responses provide more insight and accuracy into individual longevity than standardized questionnaires. CHANGING THE FACE OF INSURANCE UNDERWRITING. CHRONOS While traditional underwriting can take up to a month, CHRONOS delivers more accurate results in seconds Combining facial analytics, biodemographic information and dynamic questioning, CHRONOS returns precise and reliable scores. How Industry is Using Our Tools. Lapetus Solutions Inc. (LSI) integrates science and technology with machine learning to develop tools and platforms that enable industries relying on life event prediction to reduce and replace their dependence on traditional assessment methods with faster, more cost-effective and increasingly accurate results. By combining Life Sciences, Sensory Analytics and Dynamic Questioning to provide real time insight into an individual s health status and longevity, as well as to examine risk within specific groups, our tools also combine to form the basis of three breakthrough customer engagement platforms, delivering fully customizable, end-to-end solutions for the life insurance and financial planning industries. Our team is comprised of internationally recognized scientists in their fields, including Biodemography, Facial Analytics, Health, Aging and Data Science. Working together and drawing from the data and research of thousands of global experts, they leverage the power of Artificial Intelligence (AI) to more accurately predict life events in real time, including mortality, morbidity and healthy lifespan. Lapetus was the Greek god of mortality. Our first platform, Chronos, is named after his brother, the Greek god of time. The panels represent the three phases of life according to evolution biology: childhood, adulthood and old-age, through which a mortality curve runs, reflecting the fundamental linkage between biology and duration of life that is at the foundation of Lapetus biodemographic thinking and methods. Life Sciences: Combining decades of longevity research with biodemography at the core, specific covariates linked to lifespan are identified and predictive algorithms are generated. Through the compilation, distillation and analysis of complex and constantly evolving data from thousands of global researchers, our scientists assess and identify market-specific trends, linking specific questions to mortality risk and survival prospects. All of the following are taken into account in calculating results: anthropology, ecology, embryology, epidemiology, evolutionary biology, genetics, molecular biology, pathology and population genetics. Our Life Sciences tools can be used to provide: Life Expectacy (LE) and Healthy Life Expectancy (HLE) estimates Trend analysis on blocks of insured populations Mortality trends using Live Life Tables. Sensory Analytics An emerging science-based technology that uses digital images to examine an individual s physical features to determine longevity, health status and disease susceptibility. LSI scientists use machine learning techniques to build sensory analytics algorithms that provide real time results. They are currently researching the enhanced information that sight, voice and skin-based analytics can provide and will continue to develop new algorithms and corresponding tools based on their findings. From just a simple selfie, our Facial Analytics technology examines 100 s of points and 1000 s of regions on the face to instantly provide: BMI calculation Estimated Age Gender Smoking Indication. Dynamic Questioning Scientifically formulated questions that change according to responses provide more insight and accuracy into individual longevity than standardized questionnaires. For years, traditional methods of predicting life events have relied on asking the same types of questions. The Lapetus platform uses a range of highly predictive and variable questions based on aging science that change dynamically based on initial responses, providing results that are unique to each individual. Dynamic Questioning enables us to identify people who are likely to live exceptionally long lives, even in the face of potentially harmful behavioral risk factors. Not all smokers are equal By combining Life Sciences, Dynamic Questioning and Sensory Analytics, it is now possible to identify smokers who are likely to live longer, as well as detect when someone has not been truthful about their past and present smoking habits on an application form. Based on our two key areas of scientific study, Life Event Sciences and Sensory Analytics, we have developed a variety of customizable, risk assessment tools that can be used individually or in combination. They are grounded in algorithms using state-of-the-art machine learning techniques, continually improving with more data. Everything you need to know about our proprietary data collection initiative. What it is A continuous international cross-sectional survey designed to enhance and further develop the field of Sensory Analytics, SMILe will immediately enhance smoking validation and be used in the future to identify chronic diseases including diabetes, heart disease and dementia. Supports the global expansion of our predictive algorithms Helps our Facial Analytics engine account for differences in populations across the globe Represents a giant leap forward in our future ability to detect and predict fatal diseases and disabling health conditions. How SMILe works Individual surveys collect images, video, demographic and health data Collections use IRB approved protocol with standardized equipment Data collection teams will be engaged for global markets. Demographic Data Multiple points on each participant are captured. Image/Video Data Standardized equipment is utilized in all markets Still images and videos are captured on each participant. How we will use the data? Smoking detection Age detection Gender detection Age progression Disease detection. Who will benefit from the data? Industries Life insurance Health insurance Financial services Public Health Cosmetics Plastic surgery Telemedicine Individuals Via our personalized Health Advice (HEALTHe) tool.

Making the world safer, healthier, and more efficient. Company Providing solutions that transform business and change the world. Mission, Vision, and Values Everything we do is built on a commitment to do the right thing for our customers, our people, and our community. Our Mission, Vision, and Values guide the way we do business. Leidos makes the world safer, healthier, and more efficient through information technology, engineering, and science. Become the global leader in the integration and application of information technology, engineering, and science to solve our customers  most demanding challenges. We will deliver innovative solutions through the efforts of our diverse and talented people who are dedicated to our customers  success. We will empower our teams, contribute to our communities, and operate sustainably. Values: Integrity Is having the courage to make tough ethical decisions, taking pride in our work, being transparent with our team, and being respectful of everyone. Inclusion icon Inclusion Is fostering a sense of belonging, welcoming all perspectives and contributions, and providing equal access to opportunities and resources for everyone. Innovation icon Innovation Is not limited to our engineers and scientists. It is acting as a catalyst. Being tenacious and curious to help us excel and be a part of a learning organization. Agility icon Agility Is being flexible, creative, and resilient. It is our ability to think and act small while using the size and strength of our balance sheet to our advantage. Collaboration icon Collaboration Is being team-oriented and proactively engaging to meet shared objectives. It is about building relationships and staying connected with each other. Commitment icon Commitment Is being accountable, taking ownership, modeling servant leadership, and operating with a sense of urgency to our customers and teams. Our Business: Our key lines of business ‚Äî civil, defense, health, and intelligence ‚Äî are rife with opportunity. An expanded workforce and capabilities portfolio enables us to compete internationally and provide increased efficiency and affordability to customers. As we grow, we ll maintain our agile and creative reputation. Civil We work with our customers creating solutions to improve the environment, energy efficiency, federal infrastructure and help manage more than 43,000 flights every day. Defense Our defense business provides a diverse portfolio of systems, solutions, and services covering air, land, sea, space, and cyberspace for customers worldwide. Health Our formula to improve healthcare is simple ‚Äì fuse the world s most advanced technologies with the brightest minds in science, research, and consulting. Intelligence Using a wide range of capabilities in Enterprise IT, Data Analytics, Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning to support our customers  mission and defend against evolving threats around the world. Leidos Innovations Center (LInC) The technology-driven core of Leidos, LInC continues our tradition of solving the toughest scientific and engineering problems for customers. Leidos is listed No. 292 on the Fortune 500. Competencies Our technical core competencies underpin the work we do for our customers every day. The core competencies at the heart of our enterprise Our technical core competencies underpin the work we do for our customers every day. These competencies define the areas in which technical excellence is critical, not only for our business, but in the work we do daily to help customers achieve the important missions on the frontlines of their industry. Our competencies can be categorized in two discrete ways. First, as market-facing solutions to the most common technology challenges we are asked to solve, namely in Cyber, Digital Modernization, Integrated Systems, Mission Software Systems, Mission Support, Operations and Logistics, and Sensors, Collection and Phenomenology. Second, all of our work is underpinned by a consistent set of three enabling competencies that are critical in all the work that we do, namely Data Science and Engineering, Secure Development and Operations, and System Engineering and Integration. Explore the full range of our competencies below. Cyber We bring more than a decade of experience defending cyber interests globally and delivering advanced capabilities honed from protecting some of the world s most valuable assets. Our solutions and services ensure an adaptive defense strategy, sustainable threat protection, and a mature security posture. Digital Modernization Missions are accomplished by people, but enabled by IT. Driven by our diverse and talented workforce, we help our customers achieve their missions and IT business goals by delivering purpose-built solutions with cybersecurity as a standard, efficient project delivery, and end-user satisfaction. Integrated Systems To deliver mission-effective systems, we look beyond a single market, combining hardware and software with diverse initial applications to solve for challenges in an array of specializations including sensors and collection, virtual training, cargo inspection, electronic warfare, and autonomy. Mission Software Systems To build effective technology solutions, you must first have a critical understanding of the important work of the customer, their core mission and priority outcomes. Our mission software systems are designed to manage complexity in environments that require precision, speed, and scale in equal measure. Mission Support Through our years of direct support to these agencies, we have developed a robust understanding of our government customers and the ability to provide innovative solutions to their most demanding challenges. Mission Support provides solutions in areas such as contract transition, program execution, and staffing and workforce management. Operations & Logistics See how we have logistics down to a science in domains including aviation, C4ISR, radar, sensors, supply chain, maritime, mission support, energy, facilities, and ground. Sensors, Collection & Phenomenology The art of understanding the world through the physics of sensing, perception and the mathematics of signal processing with sensors. We develop and implement multiple sensor modalities and integrate collection systems to meet demanding requirements across multiple operational domains. Data Science & Engineering Our employees combine their deep mission expertise with tailored analytic systems to turn that data into valuable knowledge and insights for our customers. Secure Development & Operations Our focus of SecDevOps provides an integrated and standard set of tools and methods that result in reduced security risk while meeting business objectives of faster and more cost-effective project delivery. Systems Engineering & Integration Founded in extensive research, deployment, and operations experience, our tailored approach to systems engineering is designed to ensure mission success and is the foundational DNA of every technical project we execute. Technology Certifications We partner with world-class technology providers to develop innovative solutions for our customer s toughest challenges. Through annual technology certification examinations, we demonstrate our commitment to maintaining deep expertise in the leading technologies relevant to the markets and customers we serve. Markets We work with a broad range of public- and private-sector clients in the U.S. and internationally. Important work on the front lines of the world s most challenging markets For nearly 50 years Leidos has been working hand-in-hand with our customers to make the world safer, healthier and more efficient through information technology, engineering and science. Our experience spans a group of diverse markets, each of global importance. Taking this extensive experience we are delivering the next generation of agile, integrated solutions necessary for today s rapidly changing environment. Explore our market experience, below. Aviation A trusted systems integrator serving ANSPs including the FAA and NATS, the TSA, and airport operators across the globe. Our work increases operational efficiency and safety, enhances the passenger experience, and continues to further state-of-the-art situational awareness and security. Defense Our defense and intelligence business provides a diverse portfolio of systems, solutions, and services covering air, land, sea, space, and cyberspace for Defense and Intelligence customers worldwide. Our solutions include enterprise and mission IT, large-scale intelligence systems, command and control, geospatial and data analytics, cybersecurity, logistics, training, and intelligence analysis and operations support. Energy Trusted expertise for government programs and commercial energy projects. Whether your mission involves nuclear site cleanup or power grid hardening, Leidos is uniquely placed to support your important work as the world s reliance on energy continues to increase. Government Our talented employees work alongside government agencies to solve technical challenges and implement newfound efficiencies ‚Äì all with the goal of helping citizens thrive. Health We provide deep clinical and technical expertise to help our customers meet regulatory requirements, optimize technology for their clinical workflows, improve collections and reduce receivables, and keep data safe. Homeland Driven by our diverse and talented workforce, Leidos helps DHS address critical needs in protecting the homeland, responding to threats and disasters, enforcing and administering our laws, safeguarding cyberspace, and securing our borders. Intelligence We provide a wide-variety of low cost, highly effective solutions and services to the intelligence community and DoD as well as federal and civil customers, leveraging our extensive experience in the intelligence tradecraft. Science Leidos designs and delivers customized solutions that support groundbreaking medical research, optimize business operations, and expedite the discovery of safe and effective medical treatments. Space With a track record of success at NASA centers across the country, Leidos provides the mission understanding and technical expertise necessary to support advancements in space exploration and human spaceflight across the public and private space sector. Surface Transportation A new era of mobility requires specialized expertise to address paradigm shifts in how we travel and move goods in areas like connected and automated vehicles; transportation safety, operations, and system management; and freight efficiency. Ethics & Compliance We set the highest professional and personal expectations. The Leidos foundation was built on a commitment to ethics since the company s inception in 1969.  Combining policies, procedures, training and communications, the Leidos Ethics and Compliance Program is comprehensive and touches every aspect of employee conduct. Current employees stand on the shoulders of those who founded the company in 1969 and who established its solid reputation over the decades. The company s continued success stems from a culture that recruits and retains outstanding individuals committed to preserving our reputation. Data privacy is integral to our Code of Conduct and employee training programs. Protecting personal information is a commitment we make to our customers and it is an essential part of doing business. Improperly handling Personal Information, even by a single individual, can have serious consequences for our employees, our company, our investors and our customers. Responsibility & Sustainability. We value our inspired, passionate and united employees. Not only do they further the Leidos mission to provide innovative solutions, they are equally active in their communities, are ethically-minded, and make a positive difference in the world. Our solutions transform business and change the world. We re equally committed to using our time and resources to support people, enrich communities, and protect the environment. This commitment defines our philosophy on sustainability. Next Generation Identification: State-of-the-art biometric identification system to keep Americans and their families safe. NGI affects all FBI criminal history programs, including the National Crime Information Center (NCIC) and the National Instant Criminal Background Check System (NICS). With the Interstate Photo System, part of NGI, the FBI has improved image-searching capability of photographs associated with criminal history. The system supports better facial recognition and identification of scars, marks and tattoos. NGI introduced multiple features including the Repository for Individuals of Special Concerns (RISC) and Rap Back. Rap Back allows authorized users access to notifications of any criminal activity reported on individuals holding positions of public trust. In addition, Rap Back alerts criminal justice entities such as probation and parole officers of new criminal activity of people currently under investigation or supervision. The RISC capability supports rapid - under 10 seconds - mobile identification against a population which currently includes: wanted persons, sexual offenders, and known or appropriately suspected terrorists. Leidos also designed, developed, and deployed the FBI s previous system, Automated Fingerprint Identification System (AFIS) ‚Äî the fingerprint matching component of the Integrated Automated Fingerprint Identification System (IAFIS). Improving criminal identification. UK Borders: Our border protection solutions are designed to meet UK border management security needs, now and long into the future. Brexit has highlighted the crucial role that border management has on UK trade, the flow of people and goods, and keeping the country secure. Brexit presents the opportunity to reinvent border management operations. Innovative, efficient and rapid approaches to provide value to UK citizens, government, and industry are real and available. Leidos has more than 50 products and applications that form the components of end-to-end border security solutions and services. Facial recognition, surveillance technology, and public perception, Leidos VP John Mears covers hot topics in the fields of biometrics and surveillance. Biometrics Institute Leidos UK CTO Simon Daykin joins industry leaders to discuss obstacles and potential solutions surrounding biometrics. Technology, security and border control Harnessing the power of data to protect the United Kingdom. Enhancing the security of nations and the safety of citizens with our biometric solutions. Homeland Leverage IT to better serve your mission. We understand the active role that IT plays in protecting the homeland, responding to threats and disasters, enforcing and administering our laws, safeguarding cyberspace, and securing our borders. That s why we integrate, apply and advance IT and supporting services to tackle the challenges we face today and establish a purposeful roadmap for the challenges still to be uncovered, tomorrow. See how we are helping the Department of Homeland Security and national agencies across the world achieve program objectives, on time and on budget. Biometrics We develop systems that help our customers identify unknown people, and verify known people, through their biometrics, biographics, and behaviors. We ve worked in this critical law enforcement and national security field for more than 20 years, developing a range of innovative devices, systems and algorithms. Understanding the power of our unique identities in critical programs to enhance the security of nations and the safety of citizens with biometric solutions. From large-scale systems integration, design and development of biometric solutions to technical evaluations, we re integral to programs critical to the safety of citizens and security of nations. IDHaystack‚Ñ¢ (Identity as a Service) The Identification as a Service platform provides a biometric matching service that can serve as the core for any identification or verification system. Fingerprint Software Development Kit (SDK) This C++ software  library  is capable of providing a complete fingerprint encoding and matching engine that can be integrated into a user s application or system.Latent Print Fingerprint Technology (LIFT) LIFT can visualize latent fingerprints and palm prints in real-time without the need to currently rely upon chemical treatments, such as fingerprint dusting, Cyanoacrylate fuming and Ninhydrin treatment. Next Generation Identification (NGI) State-of-the-art biometric identification system used by the Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) in concert with state, local, federal, and tribal authorities. Biometrics across our markets Our expertise in biometrics lies in the breadth and depth of knowledge and learning from executions across multiple markets. Aviation, Defense, Health, Homeland, Intelligence, Science, Space, Surface Transportation. IDHaystack‚Ñ† (Identity as a Service): Biometrics matching service serving as the core for any identification or verification system. IDHaystack‚Ñ† provides on-demand, pay-as-you-go identification and verification services, all while reducing costs and increasing flexibility. As an integrated suite of reproducible sets of hardware and software, this turnkey cloud solution is designed to be deployed within any cloud environment or within a traditional networked client datacenter, and will provide a one-of-a-kind biometric transaction service. Partners and customers access the IDHaystack‚Ñ† services via an Application Program Interface (API). The current IDHaystack‚Ñ† API provides all the building blocks for incorporating biometric matching as a service into a biometric system. The API are grouped by category: Enrollment Services Comparison Services Information Services. The modalities currently available include finger, face and iris, with voice, DNA and palm planned. With fast, low-cost startup and quick, accurate operational biometric matching, IDHaystack‚Ñ† opens the door to easily adding biometric matching to a range of business services. Security and efficiency: you don t have to choose.
